sections.Situation: Kogoro has been called to the Sunflower Estate by Ryuichiro Kanazawa, he is called to investigate a stalker who is watching each and every move of the architect. Then after having barbeque, they hear a gunshot they rush to his room and find him dead. Architect Ryuichiro Kanazawa was shot in the head by the murderer, trying to conceal the murder as being done by the victim's stalker from the outside. Was this really the work of the stalker? or is the culprit among the three people.
